name: Easy Sweet Potato Dumplings
author: Belinda Owens McMath
summary: This can be a veggie dish or a desert. They are so yummy and easy to make. I tried these at a family reunion and searched the room to find out who made them and begged the recipe!
directions: Unroll crescent rolls and lay flat on a work surface
Cut sweet potato patties in half
Roll 1 half-patty in a crescent roll, stretching dough to cover patty completely and make a dumpling
Repeat with remaining patties and rolls
Dip dumplings into nuts, pressing down to coat the top
Place coated dumplings in a 9x12-inch glass baking dish, nut-side up
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Combine water, sugar, margarine, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a heavy saucepan
Cook over medium-low heat just until sugar and margarine are dissolved, 3 to 5 minutes
Pour sauce over dumplings in the baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling, 20 to 25 minutes
